extendedInfo.description: Are you a booth Renter or a Salon/Spa Owner? Do you need an app that books in 15 minutes increments, handles all of your appointments, customers information, history, will send automatic email and text reminders, and charge credit cards?Well, look no further. Finally an Android app is made for the Salon and Spa industry that will do this and more.PLEASE READ: Although the app is free, being on Vagaro.com Salon Software or Spa Software has a small $25 monthly fee with a FREE 30 days trial, we do not charge your credit card until the 31st day. The app does not work until you open an account with Vagaro.com. Once you read the set of features that comes with it, you will see why it is worth it:1.Import all of your contacts that are on the Android with one click2.Add and view appointments in day, week, or month calendar views, for the whole salon3.Search for available appointments on your calendar or the whole Salon/Spa4.Triple book5.Add recurring appointments and personal time off6.Customer database with contact info, photos, notes, allergies, formulas, appointment history and spending trends8.Sell products and track inventory9.Checkout screen that automatically does the calculation for you and sends electronic receipts to your customers10.Track charges on Cash, checks, credit cards and gift certificates11.Charge Credit cards from your Phone.(optional with merchant & retail account)12.Automatically send email and SMS text reminders and confirmation requests to your customers(No cost to you. Will not show on your phone bill)13.Set service pricing and duration14.Accept out-call appointment and track requested service location15.We backup all of your appointments and customers so even if you lose, damage, or change your phone your info is safe with us16.Forgot or lost your phone? No worries you can look up and take appointments from any computer with an internet access and it will automatically show up on your phone in seconds.17.Through our web site you can send promotional emails to your customers, and run income reports daily, weekly, monthly and yearly18.Provides you with a web page for online scheduling. Customers can book or request online appointments. Post your services, styles and directions to your business19.Unique URL on your web page that can be put on your business card20.Works for all appointment based businesses21.You will be marketed and listed on Vagaro.com website where people find visit to make appointment online in their area.22.The app comes with 24/7 Live support and a manual that can be obtained through online downloadAfter downloading the App Click on "Free Trial" Button for details. Still need information?Visit www.Vagaro.com/iPhone orCall sales at 800.919.0157 Ext 1 orEmail us at sales@vagaro.com

reviews.title: Too many differences between tablet and phone
reviews.comment: The general layout of Vagaro is great. Unfortunately there isn\'t much continuity between the app on my phone (Samsung Note 2) and my tablet (Google Nexus 10). There\'s certain things on my phone that run smoother than things on my tablet and vice versa. My number one problem is that if you check the option for starting cash you can\'t enter thst in from either of the apps, you have to go to the desktop site. Of which I can\'t access from my phone easily because it keeps trying to be a mobile site.
reviews.author: Erin Slomski

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: It freezes up sometimes but i love it, i can check my book from anywhere and see my numbers.
reviews.author: Traci-Leigh Campbell

reviews.comment: Awesome App
reviews.author: Shay Foreman

reviews.comment: Love it!
reviews.author: Jennifer Gragg

reviews.comment: Awesome!
reviews.author: Ur Tame

reviews.title: So far I love this Salon software!
reviews.comment: I\'m on my trial still, but the  app works great on my Samsung android  phone and tablet! I will most likely sign up permanently and enroll in the merchant service as well.
reviews.author: Paulette Zornig

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love the functionality of this app! I can see my schedule and book appointments from my phone or my Kindle Fire HD as well as my laptop! For some reason it has stopped pushing notifications to my phone when people make or change appointment though. I loved that feature...
reviews.author: Scott Strong

reviews.title: Good but expensive!
reviews.comment: I like the Vagaro app very much, however I pay $35 a month to maintain my website & utilize their services. There are other companies offering the same service for a lot less. Thinking if I can get the same service at a cheaper rate, it might be smart of me to save some money.
reviews.author: Laural Williams

reviews.title: Loving it so far!
reviews.comment: I am still in my 30 day trial,  but if things continue they way it has been I will definitly be purchasing it. Makes life so much easier for me at home and works. Not so many phone calls on off time :)
reviews.author: andrea henderson

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I do like this software although I keep finding teething problems in the beginning, seems to work best in Us than Uk maybe. Getting used to it!!
reviews.author: gemma catterall

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This app and program is perfect for all of your salon\'s needs. Thanks Vagaro!
reviews.author: Stephanie Woodley

reviews.title: Stylist David Wayne
reviews.comment: Love this program. Efficient and intuitive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Make the font BIGGER!!
reviews.comment: Make the font bigger!! Its very hard to read on mobile devices. My font size setting on my phone and tablet is \"huge\" and it is still miniscule on the app. I think it has nothing to do with my device settings.
reviews.author: Patricia Perron

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Works perfect for my salon needs!
reviews.author: Tonja Muret

reviews.title: Offline feature
reviews.comment: Wrote in requesting that appointment books be viewed offline and cached but they never bothered writing me back.   Great program that seems to have poor support
reviews.author: Collette Calandrino

reviews.title: A helpful app
reviews.comment: I was just using a regular scheduling calendar until I got this,and I love that it sends out confirmation emails..the app however does not let you add new services or make changes to your site
reviews.author: Kayla Pavlak

reviews.comment: Love it!!
reviews.author: Mikah Richey

reviews.title: I Love this ap.
reviews.comment: This is the best ap, i love being able to look at my schedule on the go, and the text and email reminders!
reviews.author: Celena Shore

reviews.title: Very happy!
reviews.comment: Dependable, easy, great support.
reviews.author: Amanda Jones

reviews.title: Issue resolved
reviews.comment: Had to restart phone for the up-grade to work.
reviews.author: Donna Dougherty
